bibl.title: ﬁambe›on kale›tai nËn: Genre, Occasion, and Imitation in Callimachus, frr. 191 and 203Pf. <iambeion kaleitai nun>
bibl.note: I. The context of fiction: Hipponax redivivus. - II. Genealogy or Taxonomy? The archaic iambus, occasionality and mimesis. - III. Occasion and imitation in Callimachus fr. 203P.
DEPEW Mary, ﬁambe›on kale›tai nËn: Genre, Occasion, and Imitation in Callimachus, frr. 191 and 203Pf. <iambeion kaleitai nun>
